verses.verse: "My spirit<WH7307> is consumed.<WH2254> My days<WH3117> are extinct,<WH2193> And the grave is ready for me.<WH6913>
Surely there are mockers<WH2049> with me.<WH5869> My eye dwells<WH3885> on their provocation.<WH4784>
"Now give<WH7760> a pledge,<WH6148> be collateral for me with yourself.<WH8628> Who is there who will strike hands with me?<WH3027>
For you have hidden<WH6845> their heart<WH3820> from understanding,<WH7922> Therefore you shall not exalt them.<WH7311>
He who denounces<WH5046> his friends<WH7453> for a prey,<WH2506> Even the eyes<WH5869> of his children<WH1121> shall fail.<WH3615>
"But he has made<WH3322> me a byword<WH4914> of the people.<WH5971> They<WH6440> spit in my face.<WH8611>
My eye<WH5869> also is dim<WH3543> by reason of sorrow.<WH3708> All my members<WH3338> are as a shadow.<WH6738>
Upright<WH3477> men shall be astonished<WH8074> at this.<WH5355> The innocent shall stir up<WH5782> himself against the godless.<WH2611>
Yet shall the righteous<WH6662> hold<WH270> on his way.<WH1870> He who has clean<WH2890> hands<WH3027> shall grow<WH3254> stronger and stronger.<WH555>
But<WH199> as for you all,<WH7725> come on now<WH935> again;<WH4672> I shall not find a wise man among you.<WH2450>
My days<WH3117> are past,<WH5674> my plans<WH2154> are broken off,<WH5423> as are the thoughts<WH4180> of my heart.<WH3824>
They change<WH7760> the night<WH3915> into day,<WH3117> saying<WH216> 'The light is near<WH7138>' in the presence<WH6440> of darkness.<WH2822>
If I look<WH6960> for Sheol<WH7585> as my house,<WH1004> if I have spread<WH7502> my couch<WH3326> in the darkness,<WH2822>
If I have said<WH7121> to corruption,<WH7845> <WH1> 'You are my father;' to the worm,<WH7415> <WH517> 'My mother,' and<WH269> 'my sister;'
where then is<WH645> my hope?<WH8615> as for my hope,<WH8615> who shall see it?<WH7789>
Shall it go down<WH3381> with me to the gates<WH905> of Sheol,<WH7585> or descend<WH5183> together<WH3162> into the dust?<WH6083>"
